src:
Kalah, Solskjaer Tuntut MU Segera Bangkit
03 Nov 2019, 01:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manajer Manchester United, Ole Gunnar Solskjaer melemparkan tantangan kepada para pemain Manchester United. Ia ingin pasukan Setan Merah memberikan respon cepat atas kekalahan mereka malam tadi.
Tren positif Manchester United resmi buyar. Mereka harus tumbang di tangan Bournemouth dengan skor 1-0 di pertandingan pekan ke 11 EPL musim ini.
United sendiri bukannya tanpa usaha pada laga itu. Mereka mencoba untuk menekan tuan rumah, namun The Cherries bermain dengan sangat disiplin sehingga United kesulitan untuk membuat peluang yang berbahaya di laga tersebut.
Solskjaer mengakui bahwa gol yang dicetak Bournemouth itu benar-benar menguji mental timnya. "Karakter kami diuji saat kami tertinggal 1-0 di babak pertama dan bermain di stadion seperti ini," ujar Solskjaer kepada MUTV.

Baca komentar lengkap sang manajer di bawah ini.
text:
Defeated, Solskjaer Demands MU Immediately Risen
Nov 3 2019, 01:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester United manager Ole Gunnar Solskjaer throws challenges at Manchester United players. He wants the Red Devils troops to respond quickly to their defeat last night.
Positive trends Manchester United officially dispersed. They must fall in the hands of Bournemouth with a score of 1-0 in the EPL Week 11 match this season.
United itself is not without effort in the game. They tried to pressure the hosts, but The Cherries played with such discipline that it was difficult for United to create dangerous opportunities in the match.
Solskjaer admitted that the goal scored by Bournemouth really tested the mentality of his team. "Our character was tested when we were 1-0 down in the first round and played in stadiums like this," Solskjaer told MUTV.

Read the manager's full comment below.
